description: Sakurai Kuuga is the vocalist of the rock band http://anidb.net/ch20613 [Yumemishi]. While he seems sweet and kind to his fans, in reality he is very arrogant, rude and insensitive to others feelings. It is due to his attitude that http://anidb.net/ch15147 [Misaki] dislikes him as he was very insensitive to http://anidb.net/ch15256 [Sakura] feelings while hitting on http://anidb.net/ch15147 [Misaki] herself.
name: Sakurai Kuuga
